amendment.description: To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to prohibiting infringement on the free exercise of religion.

vote.text: Amendment SA 821 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 34.

action.text: Amendment SA 821 proposed by Senator Lee. (consideration: CR S447; text: CR S447) To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to prohibiting infringement on the free exercise of religion.
